name: Injinji Trail Midweight Crew Coolmax Socks - Women's
description: Keep your toes cool and comfortable while on the trail. These midweight toesocks provide cushioning and protection from rough and rocky terrain.Super thin CoolMax® XtraLife blend wicks moisture and helps prevent blisters.Arch support for secure and stable fit.Padded cushioning provides underfoot protection.Anatomical right and left foot design enhances fit.
